Flour 1 ½ cup 

Egg 1 

Salt ½ tsp 

Water as required to make batter 

Oil for frying 

Bread crumbs as required 

Eggs 2 


Ingredients for filling: 

Chicken mince 250 gm 

Onion chopped 2 tbsp 

Ginger garlic 1 tsp 

Oil spice ½ tsp 

Salt 1 tsp 

Black pepper 1 tsp 

Chat masala ½ tsp 

Coriander leaves and green chilies chopped

Method for mince: 

Heat oil fry chopped onion till soft, add mince with ginger garlic, salt and black pepper, cover and cook on low flame, till mince tender, add in allspice, chat masala, chopped coriander and green chilies. 

Method for roll: 

Mix together flour, salt and egg, make into a thin batter using water as required, make into thin pan cakes, fill with chicken filling, roll tightly, dip in beaten eggs, roll in bread crumbs, shallow fry golden brown.
